attributes.action: Never bestow an honour upon Nigel Farage
attributes.additional_details:
He has caused so much trouble for the country, that entirely regardless of whether Britain ends up leaving the EU, he should never be rewarded for the division/trauma/upset he has brought upon both the UK & the EU over his lifetime.

The thought of him being rewarded is both offensive & physically repulsive.
attributes.background: Having heard that some are requesting NF was snubbed at the 2016 New Years Honours List by not having been bestowed a Knighthood, this is an anti- list to request that no such honour/Lordship/power or similar EVER be bestowed upon him (in relation to his work on the UK leaving the EU).
